samples.question: What are the types of books that young people like to read?
samples.transcript: I do not know. I do not really see a lot of people reading books these days. I think people rather rely on podcasts and YouTube videos or even movies or TV shows. But if I had to say, I guess novels, I think novels are the most fun, the most interesting ones. it expands their creativity, especially because, young people tend to have a lot of creativity before they go out into the real world. Okay.

samples.question: And what is the difference between the reading habits of old people and young people?
samples.transcript: Oh, I, I think that is a tough question, but, I have to think of it a thought. I have not really seen a lot of old people read books, but, and I do not really know about their habits, but I guess, young people tend to rush things. People tend to rush things. I guess they skim through the books rather than focusing on details. while old people rather, they take their time, they try to analyze everything. Because they are more mature, they are more experienced with these things. Sure.

samples.question: And tell me Sean, are you working or studying right now?
samples.transcript: I am a student. Currently I am studying electrical engineering at a university in Hong Kong.

samples.question: And do you enjoy your studies?
samples.transcript: Yes, I do. I never expected myself to be an engineer until the last year in high school, but somehow I am enjoying it. Good.

samples.question: And how is Hong Kong?

samples.question: Okay, can you tell someone's personality from his or her handwriting?
samples.transcript: Oh, that is, I think, that is a really insightful question. So, yes, I think the handwriting somehow reflects the person's personality. But when I want to show my sincerity to my people I love, I use my handwriting. Okay.
